comment: It's good app but for some reason in the new update almost every comes with premium be it surfing through song section or even playing songs in a custom order Ik it's for the money but still . Hope Spotify gives us those features back for free again 冒聼聵聜 good thing they got some essential songs back 冒聼聰聶
key sentence: The key words: premium features, new update, song section, custom order
the function of activity: The activity involves searching, library function, playing/pausing items, viewing downloaded songs/podcasts, downloading songs or podcasts, adding to playlists, shuffling a playlist, connecting to devices, previewing episodes, type replies to episodes and accessing history page, setting page
the sub-task list of state: [{'name': 'Add to Liked Songs', 'description': 'Add the currently playing song to Liked Songs list.'}, {'name': 'Add to playlist', 'description': 'Add the currently playing song to a specific playlist.'}, {'name': 'Hide this song', 'description': 'Remove the current song from the visible list.'}, {'name': 'Add to queue', 'description': 'Add the current song to the music queue.'}, {'name': 'View album', 'description': 'View details and information about the album of the current song.'}, {'name': 'View artist', 'description': 'Get more information about the artist of the current song.'}]

operations.event: click(android.widget.ImageButton-More options for song 摯友:[948,1264][1080,1396])
